author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Extend the possibility of new cells needed for rotated full wafers (in place of #35864)

#### PR validation:

Use cfg's in Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test/python and also use the runTheMatrix test workflow

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx293A Extend the possibility of new cells needed for rotated full wafers
